entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries near midnight and ending after midnight then clearing. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
